content.raw:
Thank you for your answer.

I don't know if this line is usefull at all. It has been added here : #!/osrf/gazebo/commits/657230d00c8bc8d90d0b3bfa99fe735498d3900b#chg-gazebo/physics/Link.cc
And the commit comment say "debuging".

How to know when this line could be useful and when not ?
